Pre-Game Insights: England have won their last seven T20Is against Sri Lanka
England have firepower right through their batting order
Sri Lanka have a superior contingent of spinners
Adil Rashid has been wicketless in the tournament so far but has nine wickets against Sri Lanka in seven matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is still a young team, and though they perhaps didn't quite live up to their dark-horse billing, they will have salvaged something out of a rough tournament
A loss leaves a different flavour; they'd have defeated only teams they were expected to beat
Others: England are likely to retain the side that beat New Zealand
Sri Lanka may go with the same XI that beat Afghanistan, though there may be some thought to bringing back allrounder Chamika Karunaratne
